column4: anybody can help me ? after the last update I can't enable anymore visual effects and can't play wine games, I've an ATI card with catalyst 9.2
if it was a kernel update and if you installed the ati drivers direct from ati then you need to reinstall them again to make it work
it wasn't a kernel update, I think it was because of xserver-common and xserver-xorg-core
could be.. still.. might try installing them again
